Crossing poing (Cp) = Cycle quantification (Cq) = Cycle threshold (Ct) = Take-off point (TOP)
</div>

<img src="/Volumes/Data/實驗室準則/qPCR 訓練課程/qPCR_slide/Pictures/qPCR_CT.jpg" style="zoom:80%; border:0; border-radius: 20px; box-shadow:0 0 0;" alt="qPCR_Ct">

</div>

## PCR efficiency

<img src="/Volumes/Data/實驗室準則/qPCR 訓練課程/qPCR_slide/Pictures/PCREfficiency.jpg" style="zoom:60%; border:0; box-shadow: 0 0 0; border-radius: 10px;" alt="PCR efficiency">

<div style="font-size:12px; color: #000088;">
Reference: http://www.gene-quantification.de/pfaffl-qPCR-efficiency1.gif
</div>

## PCR efficiency (I)

<div style="text-align:left; font-size:30px; color:blue;">- PCR product number at the number of Cp</div>

$N = N_{0}\times E^{Cp}$

<div style="text-align:left; font-size:30px; color:blue;">- Linearised</div>

$LogN = LogN_{0}+Cp\times LogE$

<div style="text-align:left; font-size:30px; color:blue;">
- Calculate the "Cp" and describe the PCR amplification
</div>

$Cp=-(\frac{1}{LogE})LogN_{0}+\frac{LogN}{LogE}$


>- Slope of this equation!
>- Draw the plot...

## PCR efficiency (II)

```{r PCR Efficiecy, echo=FALSE, include=TRUE,error=FALSE,fig.width=5, fig.height=3.75}

curve(-3.363*x+30,from=1,to=8, xlab = "Log Concentration", ylab = "Cp", col="red")

```

<div style="text-align:left; font-size:30px; color:blue;">

- PCR efficiecy "E" can be described as

</div>

>- $E = 10^{-\frac{1}{Slope}}$
>- $E(\%) = -1 + 10^{-\frac{1}{Slope}}$

## Relative quantification (I)

<div style="font-size:25px; text-align:left;">
<ul>
<li> Determination of mRNA expression level
<li> Gene dosage quantification
<li>Relative to <font style="color:red;">reference gene</font> and/or <font style="color:red;">calibrator sample</font>
</ul>
</div>
<img src="/Volumes/Data/實驗室準則/qPCR 訓練課程/qPCR_slide/Pictures/RelativeProteinExpression.jpg" style="zoom:50%; border: 5px dotted #33CCFF; box-shadow:0 0 0;" alt="Relarive Protein expression">
<div style="font-size: 18px; text-align:left; color: #888888;">
- SA: stalbe angina<br>
- ACS: acute coronary syndrome
</div>
<div style="font-size:12px; color: #000088;">
Reference DOI: 10.5114/aoms.2014.44871
</div>

## Relative quantification (II)
<br>
<div style="color: red; text-align: left;">

$Relative\ ratio = \frac{Target\ gene\ concentration}{Reference\ gene\ concentration}$

</div>
<div style="text-align: left; font-size: 20px;">
Reference gene:

- Unaffected by experiment conditions (non-regulated)
- Wide variety of cellular processes
- One or more reference can be used

</div>

<img src="/Volumes/Data/實驗室準則/qPCR 訓練課程/qPCR_slide/Pictures/ReferenceGeneSelection.jpg" style="zoom: 50%; border:0; box-shadow:0 0 0;" alt="Reference gene selection">

<div style="font-size:12px; color: #000088;">
Reference DOI: 10.1016/j.bbrc.2003.11.177 (被引用1,367次)
</div>

## Relative quantification (III)

<div style="text-align: left; font-size: 25px;">

Optional:

<div style="color: red; text-align: left;">

$Calibrator\ Normalize\ Ratio = \frac{\frac{Target\ gene\ concentration}{Reference\ gene\ concentration}(Sample)}{{\frac{Target\ gene\ concentration}{Reference\ gene\ concentration}(Calibrator)}}$

</div>

Calibrator:

- Correct the differences in detection sensitivity between Target / Reference gene and several experiments (e.g., long-term studies)

- Not treated cell line
- Sample before experiment

</div>

## Relative quantification (IV)

<ol>
<li> Efficacy = 2 → ($2^{\Delta\Delta CT} method$)
<li> Efficacy adjust (linear) - using standard curve
</ol>

# 一定要遵守這些事

## 請注意！

<ul>
<li> 使用前登記，安排實驗次序
<li> 注意空調，維持機器運作時的室內溫度
<li> 限定使用原廠白盤及封膜！ (未遵守者禁止使用)
<li> 燈泡很貴！請算好操作的時間，不要開著機器讓他燒！
</ul>
